website_summaries.verdict: Watch years of grime, dirt, and grease slip away and see a return to original shine.
pros: Extra-long spray tube reaches corners and tilts as you spray
Cuts through grease in a snap
cons: May need to use a brush if buildup is excessive
Don't use in full sun, as it could turn blotchy on wheels/tires

customer_reviews.title: Best Product Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have Lexani rims that are black with chrome tip and I’ve struggled for months to find a product that works with helping me clean them and keep them clean. To my surprise this works and I’m in heaven. I’m a female and love to wash my truck but couldn’t clean inside my wheel and unless the inside drum area is cleaned, the rim looks dull and dirty. I’m a forever fan now!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Bagent

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works as advertised! You honestly get a lot of liquid for the price compared to other brands. Its pretty simple to use, just spray water on the wheels first then spray this solution on. Using a brush will absolutely help remove more dirt built up, finally just rinse it off with water. I’ve been using this wheel cleaner on my ray volk racing wheels and they work pretty in taking out all the dirt. The bottle comes pre sealed and capped which is really smart for shipping so nothing can spill out. Overall, its a great product and this is my first time going with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: kuriouskoala

customer_reviews.title: It did exactly what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: It did exactly what I needed. My sons care had been in Connecticut for two winters and his beautiful chrome wheels were black. I tried several other products before you’d and none even came close to the results I got from yours. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: RAG

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel cleaner Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best wheel cleaner Ever. My rims are 5 years old and my local Schwab dealer asked what I have been using. They look new again. .. Awesomeness
customer_reviews.author: David Gempler

customer_reviews.title: It works as good, if not better than the Sonax Wheel Cleaner ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked to clean my wheels. I probably should have let it sit longer and used a brush to agitate it more. I did not dilute the solution. It works as good, if not better than the Sonax Wheel Cleaner Plus.
customer_reviews.author: pinoyz

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to all
customer_reviews.text: Once again Trinova amazes me. I now have their tire shine, rim cleaner and am looking to try the leather conditioner next. Trinova customer service is also top notch. Recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Jigga69

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I thought maybe it costs so much because it’s much better and I have small grooves in my wheels that are a pain to clean properly. Was hoping this would clean areas I can’t physically run clean. Not the case. In fact the wheel cleaner I only pay $5 at Walmart is more effective than this one. It’s doesn’t remove anything without you rubbing it off yourself, which you could do with any cleaner. Previous cheaper brands I tried , actually cause film and dirt to run off the wheel as you spray it on and then rinse it. This one doesn’t. It didn’t even cut the leftover wheel shine. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Pettersen

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money. I had to work so hard to clean the rims, so this product by itself didn’t do anything. I wish I knew this was going to be the case, because the amount of work I put, I could of used any cleaner to get the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Hany Saad

customer_reviews.title: removing aged break wear residuet
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Acura TSX with aluminum wheels, after years of not doing a great job keeping up on through cleaning of the wheels, i purchased this product after reading several very positive reviews hoping to get the wheels back to factory look. Well, this product didn't cut it... it got the loose dust/break dirt off the rims but not the older caked in dirt. I ended up buying a product made by "Mother" for cleaning aluminum rims... and this was awesome... took two time to do it but the rims look like they just came from the manufacturer. (plus this product was less expensive.)
customer_reviews.author: Zeno Chaply

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Trinova gave me a free product after I ordered in lew of giving feedback. But I waited before I actually use it to give my honest opinion. I just purchased a new performance german car and they are notorious from putting out a lot of nasty brake dust, 400 miles after, I sprayed a generous amount and I see the brake dust breaking down right away, I waited about 3-5 min, then washed it off with a pressure washer using 25o nozzle and the result was what you see in the photo without wiping it off. The only thing is you will need plenty in stock. So far most effective wheel cleaner I've used.
customer_reviews.author: I. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to use but It left a horrible white residue ...
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to use but It left a horrible white residue on my aluminum method race wheels. They look worse then They did before I cleaned them! Now i will have to re-polish them entirely!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Walker

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing on my wheels
customer_reviews.text: Highly rated product, probably because they offer a free bottle if you leave a good review. But I used this as directed, and it did absolutely nothing on my brake dust crusted wheels. Applied it twice, scrubbed, used brush, used dish scrubber, all nothing. But I did use Sonax Wheel Cleaner, which was by far the most effective product I tried. Even then you have to do it a couple of times if your wheels are as caked on as mine. Buy Sonax, not this.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wilzoch

customer_reviews.title: It worth its price!
customer_reviews.text: So glad to order the "wheel cleaner rim cleaning spray". It was true, oil residue, dust and more dirt were easily removed after the last car wash of my 10+ year old SUV. I sprayed this product in the rims, waited for 10+ seconds and polished the rims with a piece of cloth. Now, I can see the shinny metal part of the rims. The bottle arrived in good condition shipped inside a box. Yes, I would recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: HappyHummingbird1964

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special, at all...
customer_reviews.text: Have been searching for a product which will remove brake dust easily and effectively; this is not it. In fact, there does not appear to be any incremental value to this spray, over simply scrubbing your wheels with soap and water (which is what you have to do when using this product). If you spray this on, wait, then rinse, it does not remove any significant amount of dust. You must then wash your wheels. Given the price, this is a "must miss" item. The search continues...
customer_reviews.author: NHHawk6

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Spent a while looking for a solid cleaner for my chrome wheels. I didn’t expect this cleaner to do that bad. I’ve bought chrome cleaner from wal-mart that worked better than this. It did literally nothing unless I scrubbed and even then, my wheels are still dirty and streaking after multiple coats. Don’t waste your time with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Agin

customer_reviews.title: Did a great job cleaning my wheels
customer_reviews.text: Spray bottle was easy to apply product on wheels. With a brush and some elbow grease, it removed a lot of the brake dust and debris that was on my wheels. It was definitely in need of a good cleaning. After a good rinsing and drying, the wheels looked shiny again (aside from the bad curb rashes). One bottle can probably clean 8 pairs of tires, depending on how generous you are with the spraying.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Runs out quickly.
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent cleaner, you can see it work on the the actual wheel when I sprayed it, it started dripping brown. I only got 3 uses out of it however, I used it for 3 cars and already ran out, keep in mind how many times you'll use it and how big are your rims. Also it stains concrete and washes away soapy looking, I find that weird.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Reyes Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Just Like New.
customer_reviews.text: I have used various wheel cleaners over the years, Zymol in particular, all have worked well. TriNova has exceeded my expectations,using friends very dirty wheels ( brake dust, mud, etc) as a test, a week later everyones wheels still shine as new. You will not be disappointed,I let the cleaner sit for 10 minutes on the wheels, a light scrub with a sponge, hose it off. Done. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Charles  Coombs

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner and even Better Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I initially had problems using this cleaner. However, Sherri from Gold Star reached out to me to assist me with any problems that I was having and gave me the right solution to help clean my rims better. Make sure to agitate the harder spots with a brush or terry cloth, it will make a ton of a difference! This cleaner really does the job and from what i noticed, even protects from brake dust. And to top it off, their customer service is TOP NOTCH!
customer_reviews.author: Asad Hadyer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but no bad.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see any shocking results like some people mention. This stuff is about as good as the glass cleaner I used on my wheels in the past. I have better luck using Chemical Guys products over this TriNova brand. I even tried TriNova car soap and wasn't impressed, my Ajax dish soap works better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: My new go to wheel cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I gave this cleaner a quick trial. It's stinking aweeeome! I figured it wouldn't be that great, so I got lazy and just sprayed it on. It worked so well that I plan on taking the wheel off of my trucks to get a good scrub on the entire inside of the wheels. This cleaner removed years work of brake dust and grime in a matter of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Rafi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap sprayer leaks
customer_reviews.text: This is the First wheel cleaner i have ever used that is a true spray on wash off cleaner.. i even waited weeks in the new england winter to make sure my wheels were nice and dirty to try it out.. I am only posting 4 starts because this product and their (trinova) tire shine spray came with spray handles that leak all over your fingers when spraying. I used a little more than half a bottle of each because most of it landed on the ground. So unfortunately for me this was only a 2 use product..
customer_reviews.author: Brad Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Actually quite good
customer_reviews.text: Have a decent set of brushes available - still requires some mechanical cleaning. Don't spray the next wheel while you do the current one. The stuff will start to dry. Stick to one wheel at a time. Spraying just a little water with the bottle mixture can help a little. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: wrbrower

customer_reviews.title: impressive
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with the packaging and the seller got back to me within 24 hours and has now promised to send me another bottle of the same cleaner. The product that was left in the bottle and I was able to use worked as advertised and on wheels that brake dust adheres to. Will see how long the shine last and how easy it will be to remove the brake dust. I would buy again from the seller, because of the customer service response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good wheel cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It's really a good wheel cleaner. I'm trying to clean chrome motorcycle wired rims. I had to let it set longer than the recommended time. There were places I cannot get a brush into between the spokes. I was able to get some of the grime off using a pressure washer after letting the wheel cleaner set for a while. I'm certain this product would work well on auto rims. This is a project that may take a harsher solvent, but all in all they look much better.
customer_reviews.author: mark sherlock

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for Serious Detailers
customer_reviews.text: I have used many products over the years and I would certainly put this product in the top 2-3. No product ever removes brake dust without a little effort on the users part (if it does it is probably harming your rim material or paint/powder coating) but the TriNova does a nice job in losening the bond of the dust making cleaning easier, leaving a nice clean surface.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great great great that's all I could say.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I ever used cuts through the grease like nothing comes off excellently this part of it is very recommended by me I give it 10 Stars if I could and the shipping was fast no doubt I'll be buying this again thank you for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Harleydon

customer_reviews.title: Well made and does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I have new (3 months) black wheels on my 2006 Corvette. I haven’t been able to see them shine since they were brand new, until using this product. I found spraying a second time before brushing was the trick. Perfect. This is really an outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Philly House

customer_reviews.title: Left wheels pretty spotted and had to redo the cleaning process twice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a variety of wheel cleaners before but this one was new for me. It definitely worked to remove brake dust and grime from the wheel, but after rinsing the wheel as the directions outline, the wheels were quit spotted. I had to use some of my other wheel cleaner to remove the spots and clean the wheels. I won’t use this again since it added this additional step of cleaning after the cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: John Chinello

customer_reviews.title: It does work good enough.
customer_reviews.text: It worked better than the cheaper brands like Black Magic Aluminum Wheel Cleaner and the Armor All Wheel Cleaner, but I did have to scrub pretty hard with a plastic bristle brush to get some brake dust and dirt residue off that was 2 weeks old.
customer_reviews.author: M****Z

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely quick
customer_reviews.text: So i put a big brake kit on my car and expected the extra dust that comes with it. Even though i have street cool carbon pads. Its just the innate nature from the rotors and bmw. This works lime a charm forna quick detail. And me who i am, it has to be clean all the time. Can't have a dirty car or house. Shows who you are. Definitely will be my wheel quick details.
customer_reviews.author: Sinner

customer_reviews.title: Spend half as much on cheaper brands and get the same result
customer_reviews.text: Reading the description, I expected this wheel cleaner to be the answer to my prayers: remove the brake dust and road dust from the wheels of my BMW and Porsche. Unfortunately, it's no better than wheel cleaners at half the price. Even required more hand brushing after application and spray. I ordered three bottles, soI'll use them til they're all gove but then go back to any one of half a dozen brands tht cost half as much. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Klinger

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Even Old Wheels!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner did the best job of any product I've ever used on my 21 year old Honda Aluminum wheels. While the wheels do show 214K worth of wear Trinova melted away most of the built up dust in the hard to reach areas without scrubbing, I suspect after a few more cleanings all of the old brake dust built up over the years will be gone!
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Bob

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel cleaner that I have found.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this several times now which goes to show how much I like it. If your wheels aren't too dirty, you can spray it on, wait a minute or two, then hose it off and you are done. If the wheels haven't been cleaned in a while, you'll need to do a little brushing but you won't be gagging on the fumes like from some other wheel cleaners. (yes, I'm washing the wheels outside, not inside a garage). This cleaner gives off a light soap smell but nothing real strong.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent products. Really works very well. The cleaner makes for any easy job of a squeaky clean wheel. The tire shine works well, and I agree with other reviewers that you should let it sit. Definitely worth The cost.
customer_reviews.author: JD II

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Aluminum rims beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my aluminum rims that were CAKED in brake dust. This was able to clean them wonderfully with the addition of a copper brush and some elbow grease. Took about an hour to clean 4 rims, and almost the entire bottle. One bad thing - the solution is very liquid and it would run off the rim pretty quickly. A better solution might have been a gel, but then it can't be in a spray bottle...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TriNova Wheel Cleaning Spray
customer_reviews.text: I got what I think was tar on my car wheels. Tried every cleaning product I had at home to try to clean it off. Nothing worked. I ordered a bottle of TriNova Spray, and it got it off my wheel. It wasn't easy, had to scrubb and work on it, but It came off. So I'm happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: works really well
customer_reviews.text: The perfect companion to their tire dressing. I got all three Trinova products, tire dressing, wheel cleaner and the platic restorer... all great products.
customer_reviews.author: CALI GDOG

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love this wheel cleaner. I had a major brand and sprayed this product on one wheel and the major brand on another so I could compare. This wheel cleaner worked better. I enjoy using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda M. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on the tires and rims of a Ford F-150 and BMW X1 and it worked great! I did have to scrub lightly on the front rims of both vehicles because of break dust build up, but I have to do that no matter what product I use. I bought this product because of the reviews - my other go-to underwent a change that made it crap....I did better to just use plain water. This stuff was easy to spray on and worked as described! Will stick to this product go forward!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny C

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different wheel cleaners before and this Trinova is really great. I was excited to try this on my wheels today even though it was snowing in nyc. I haven't cleaned my wheels in 2 month and I'm happy to say that this wheel cleaner is the best one I've used so far. I might have used a bit more than I needed but no harm. Do use a wheel brush though if you have more than ordinary dirt and dust build up. No wheel cleaner can get rid of brake dust alone not even the really expensive ones. Good job Trinova!!
customer_reviews.author: kano

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel cleaner IMO.
customer_reviews.text: Sprays on easily and washes off easily, removed about 92% of brake dust and grime from my wheels without scrubbing. The other 8% I just wiped with a shop towel. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer 2015

customer_reviews.title: Is there a company worse than Chemical Guys? Yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was hopeful with all of the positive reviews, but for me, this product fell flat. I drive a vehicle that is hard on brakes and it dispenses a lot of dust on the black wheels. Tried this product and was pretty disappointed. Going back to Sonax and this is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Romanova

customer_reviews.title: This product does make your wheels shine and also gets ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does make your wheels shine and also gets rims way cleaner than a car wash however it doesn't eat grime and dust even with scrubbing as claimed, just kinda cleaned them up left brake dust etc visible
customer_reviews.author: live to hunt

customer_reviews.title: The best wheel cleaner on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Trinova wheel cleaner recently, my wheels and tires collect so much brake dust and grime. Trinova has solved it by making a cleaner that is safe! I have tried all kinds but will stick to Trinova from now on!
customer_reviews.author: PAKE

customer_reviews.title: You still need to agitate it while its on the rim. You mind as well use soap and water!!!!
customer_reviews.text: You still need to agitate it while its on the rim. You mind as well use soap and water!! Definitely. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: john g

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Didn’t take all the grim off of my wheels. I sprayed half a bottle. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: j. kosinski, fl

customer_reviews.title: Ok for light brake dust
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to clear some heavy brake dust for my car. I washed the tires, sprayed this and let this sit for a while before using soft scrub brush. For a dirtier wheel, you need significant elbow grease and washes to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Mon&Arn

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Finally able to wash my car after a long winter and used this product. It works but not better than the other product that I had been using but the price is lower so I will stick with this product. It still requires some old school rubbing with a towel but makes the whole process easier and quicker.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel cleaner. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! I've been searching for something that would clean the stubborn break dust from the wheels of my Camaro. I have to was often to keep clean & this has, by far, worked better than anything else I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: ugauk

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. My wheels were still full of dirt and dust after applying. Will continue to use as I have the product but definitely not purchasing againm
customer_reviews.author: Casey L

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is "Wow!' It works with little effort. Spray, wait a few minutes, quick soft brush, rinse, wipe, done! Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps for those rims in need of help
customer_reviews.text: Not a significant shine or add to new rims. They may get be good for older or those needs in need, but it's not for the shine effect on new rims
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to clean my rims and hub caps, all is gleaming now. It does what it says it does, clean away all the road grime and greasy oily stains. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Doobie Do

customer_reviews.title: Works as advised
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Will continue to use in the future. Made my filthy wheels look much better. Going to use after I wash my car regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Steeler Man(58)

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Best wheel cleaner I've ever owned. It cleans and shines quicker & better than any other product out there. This will now be my forever go to.
customer_reviews.author: QuahRunner

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel cleaner I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! The instructions say to spray on and let work for a couple minutes then agetate with a brush. I didn't even need a brush. The brake dust just ran off the wheels. Rinse and done. It's that easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Best will cleaner on the market without a doubt.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a car buff and use high end car products to detail my cars ( chem. Guys.) Used tri nova today and was so empressed with the results. My wheels look like new.
customer_reviews.author: gary  Wallack

customer_reviews.title: It works just like it is supposed to...
customer_reviews.text: Best wheel cleaner that I have ever used. I had at least 6 months of brake dust built up on my wheels, and using this product, it cut through the grime like a hot knife through butter. I was amazed at how easily this stuff broke it down. I had to use a brush, of course, after letting the product sit for 2-3 minutes (just as the directions suggested). But to see a product work just as directed and advertised was a welcome change. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: John Edward Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good if you use agitation, doesn't smell bad like meguiars
customer_reviews.text: Does not smell as bad as meguiars. Was hoping for better results since the leather cleaner works pretty well. But this definitely needs brush agitation to work well. I'm looking for spray on and hose wheel cleaner and found sonax to be much more effective
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Starts working quickly
customer_reviews.text: My rims were pretty filthy with an unusually high amount of tar bits on them, but you can see the cleaner dissolving the brake dust immediately. Not all the bits of tar came off, but I may not have let the cleaner work long enough before scrubbing and washing. Overall a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saw a video test-I bit
customer_reviews.text: Saw a video where a guy tests five car products. Never heard of this one, so thought I'd try it. No better (or worse) than the others.
customer_reviews.author: CaptMorgan

customer_reviews.title: Great product though overall
customer_reviews.text: TriNova's wheel cleaner left my wheels amd rims sparkly clean with minimal effort after letting the sprayed product sit for about a minute or two on each wheel and rim. The only criticism I would have is that there isn't ore product in each bottle for the price. Great product though overall. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pierre J Hakim

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well enough
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well enough, but seems like you need to use a lot of it. Also, not impressed with the after look, dries almost too quickly and can leave streaks. But great to ditch brake dust effects and safe on painted/dipped rims.
customer_reviews.author: David Graham

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Great results.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of rim cleaners and this is the best by far. Spray it on the rims agitate with a brush and rinse off. The rims look like they were waxed. Spotless and super hydrophobic. Just beautiful. Solid value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: BGH

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I've been a bit lazy when it comes to cleaning my wheels lately. This took more usage than I would have hoped for, but it did work. Wheels look great after using.
customer_reviews.author: JOE CRUISE

customer_reviews.title: Effective wheel cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked as listed; it doesn’t dissolve the dirt but any dust and grime is easily removed. In my opinion it must be applied to a dry wheel, I believe cleaners applied to wet wheels are easier to use as they offer coverage without spraying as much cleaner. That being said, it cleans well and is easily sprayed off with water.
customer_reviews.author: B of Anacortes

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do; cleans your wheels.
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend TriNova Wheel Cleaner Rim Cleaning Spray to my friends & family. And what's also great is that you get (1) product free. This stuff works great too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gunz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Seriously I bought this wheel cleaner along with my tire shine and plastic and trim restorer and I was blown away and how well it works! I am officially a TriNova fan
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: Works but takes 2-5 try's
customer_reviews.text: The brake dust will slowly dissolve but takes quite a while and a few try's. Still have some tough spot brake dust remaining. But it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. Just spray it on, scrub a little bit with a sponge and wipe it off with a wet paper towel or spray it off with water. Cleans a wheel in 5 min. It isn’t as quality as a professional car wash or detail but for a quick nice cleaning it works perfectly. Other people must have gotten fakes. This works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Amaya & Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Works well. Easy to use. Very little scrubbing required. Leaves bright, clean shine. Cons: Do not use it in full sun, the coverage turns out blotchie. Also, for reasons of safety and general knowledge, the ingredients should be on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Vagueus

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cleaner that would make my Jeep Wrangler rims look like new again. I was prty critical on the before and after pictures and didn’t believe them. However, this product proved me wrong. My rims look as close to possible as new again and I’m a huge fan of this product!! 5 stars! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great to remove brick dust and road grime with very ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great to remove brick dust and road grime with very little effort but for heavy baked on or neglected wheels you will need a brush to loosen the brake dust
customer_reviews.author: Moonlights392$

customer_reviews.title: Trinova Review
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and much better than other spray-on wheel cleaners I've used. Efficiently removes brake dust build-up, especially when combined with a quality spoke brush, from my black wheels which are hard to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: D. Forshee

customer_reviews.title: It's an ok product but not the best for how long it lasts
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok tire cleaner. Seems like the shine lasts a day or two until I need to redo the tires
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Accidentally ordered two bottles... now I'm glad I did!
customer_reviews.text: I use the product on my black painted wheels. Definitely does the trick! It makes removing the dirt and grime effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product is pretty darn good!! Not worried about chemicals damaging the rim or brake calipers. Definitely endorse.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice J. Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wheel cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This wheel cleaner is very very easy to use. Does a great job on removing road dirt and brake dust. As with my other wheel cleaners I lightly brush them before rinsing and everything rolls right off. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: blucrzr

customer_reviews.title: Regular soap is better than this product. Stay away.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as advertised. Did not remove the wheel grime even after leaving it for a while and heavy scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Balaji Ramakrishnan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This wheel cleaner is very powerful. Extremely pleased with the way it cleans my mag wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P. Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a while. It works great. Spray it on and let it sit for a couple of minutes and then hit it with a brush and rinse. It works great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Smile'in  Jack

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a new truck and everything looked great except the tires. A scrub brush (recommended after the products sits for a few minutes) was not needed but wiping them with a strong reuable paper towel helped get dirt off. 100% would buy again & already told my friends and family about the product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Just another product...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing really that special about product. Easy to use ,yes..just spray on etc....
customer_reviews.author: R. A. ELLIOTT

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It real does clean rims but the spray nozzle stopped working before the bottle was empty!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Miles

customer_reviews.title: Still need a tire shine after cleaning tire with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Like that it pulled up deeply penetrated grease and dirt. Didn’t like that it doesn’t leave a shine.
customer_reviews.author: Laudy

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back
customer_reviews.text: The product description is misleading. The one product i might have been in search of is listed in the product details section of the pictured item, however there is no such thing contained within this bottle. wish i could get my money back because it will not clean worth a crap either. plain ole water and a brush works just as good as this product and a brush. either way you must use the brush
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: Pure trash. Waste of money and time. The worst wheel product I have ever used. RIP OFF!
customer_reviews.author: OE

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: only used once so far and no issues. Does what its suppose to
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Although it does its job and you can see the dirt being washed away, it doesnt get in all the nooks and crannies and you will still have to go back in and hand wash the wheel. My advice is to invest in a better cleaner and save yourself time
customer_reviews.author: SHIBU MATHEW

customer_reviews.title: same as other brands for me.
customer_reviews.text: works okay. not sure I understand why but 2 wheels worked much better than the other two. the front tires much better than the rear. I hope it will prevent brake dust stains.
customer_reviews.author: diydiy

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: This wheel cleaner works great, leaves wheels shiny and clean! You can spray on and wash off if your wheels are fairly clean, but if they have a lot of dust or dirt then a light brushing from a soft bristle brush works best before rinsing off. I've tried several of the wheel cleaners on Amazon and this has been the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: MEK

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: "Worked as advertised, made my wheels look very shiny and new. Thanks Trinova"
customer_reviews.author: BobbyV

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!  I was amazed!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different ways to get the stains off my car's alloy rims and nothing has work...until I tried this product! I have never written a product review before, but this worked so great I felt compelled to do so. This product removed at least 98% of the stains on the rims and they look brand new! I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever tested
customer_reviews.text: This wheel cleaner is awesome! and I have plans to give it a try to tire shine and other products from this brand
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wheel cleaner! Works insanely well and my wheels always look brand new when I'm done!
customer_reviews.author: cleonard

customer_reviews.title: cleans but needs a brush
customer_reviews.text: it cleans the grime and mud but you need to agitate with a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Best Wheel Cleaner I have used at any price point.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Chemical Guys Wheel Cleaner for several months. It works but still requires quite a bit of scrubbing. Trinova Wheel Cleaner works a little better but with a lot less scrubbing on my part
customer_reviews.author: one_ed

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Tires are looking great. Have told my son and family about this.
customer_reviews.author: Jean R. Ankrom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: Eh I used better products than this. It didn’t meet my expectations at all...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

product_meta.title: TriNova Wheel Cleaner Rim Cleaning Spray - Remove Tire Dirt, Oil Residue, Dust & More - Restores Shine & Clears Stains - Polished, Painted Alloy, Chrome Wheels. 18 OZ
feature_bullets: ☑️ Removes Unwanted Grime - TriNova's Wheel Cleaner is a premium spray that will give your dirty wheels back their original shine by melting away dirt and grime that accumulates from things like brake dust and oil residue. This spray even works to fight against snow and salt that can ruin the appearance of your wheels in the wintertime.

☑️ Tough on Stains to Restore Shine - This spray easily restores the original shine to your car wheels or rims by tackling even the toughest stains that have set in from exposure to damaging elements over time. TriNova's uses a powerful concentrated formula to penetrate deep into stains caused by dirt and wash them away to make your car look like you just drove it out of the showroom.

☑️ Suitable for All Wheel Types - TriNova knows that not all wheels are the same, which is why they've designed this Wheel Cleaning Gel to be safe for use on all types, from aluminum to chrome to white-wall tires, while still providing the ultimate clean you're looking for. Regardless of material, cleaning them is a cinch with TriNova's spray.

☑️ Acid-Free Formula - This spray is completely acid-free, which means you won't have to worry about any long-term damage being caused to your wheels just to get the clean you want. Whether you're cleaning the factory wheels on your family SUV, sedan or minivan, or the after-market wheels on your sports car or hobby vehicle, TriNova's Wheel Cleaning Gel provides the protection against dirt and grime your car deserves.
